add $t1, $0, $0
0 0 0 16 0 32
0000/00 00/000 0/0000 /0100/1 000/00 10/0000
00004820hex

add $t2, $0, $0
0 0 0 10 0 32
0000/00 00/000 0/0000 /0101/0 000/00 10/0000
00005020hex

slti $t0, $t1, 10
10 9 8 10
0010/10 01/001 0/1000 /0000/0000/0000/1010
2928000ahex

addi $t0, $0, 0
8 0 8 0000000000000000
20010000hex

beq $t0, 0 exit
4 8 0 3
0001/00 01/000 0/0000 /0000/0000/0000/0011
11000003hex

add $t2, $t2, $t1
0 10 9 10 0 32
0000/00 01/010 0/1001 /0101/0 000/00 10/0000
01495020hex

addi $t1, $t1, 1
8 9 9 1
0010/00 01/001 0/1001 /0000/0000/0000/0001
21290001hex
